QuestData.Title: The Boon of Alexstrasza
QuestData.Description: You must understand, young $r, that cleansing the body in favor of life anew is something well within my grasp... removing the plague of undeath without affecting the body, however, is beyond the scope of the powers that I control.$B$BIf this Bridenbrad is the beacon of light that you profess him to be, perhaps he will endure such a cleansing and thrive, but I cannot state with confidence that this is the salvation that you seek. Take it and go with all of my blessings.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Breath of Alexstrasza to Crusader Bridenbrad at the Silent Vigil in Icecrown.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have returned yet again, $c. Why do you risk yourself so?
QuestData.RewardText: The breath of Alexstrasza... you have gone to the dragon-queen herself? I'm extremely grateful.$B$BI understand the risks of such cleansing and I am prepared. Proceed, $c.
